verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these תֹּלְד֥וֹת <S%H8435><s%> to-le-Dot Now these [are] the generations עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav of Esau ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> e-Dom. who [is] Edom

עֵשָׂ֛ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav Esau לָקַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נָשָׁ֖יו <S%H802><s%> na-Shav his wives מִבְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> mib-be-Not of the daughters כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עָדָ֗ה <S%H5711><s%> 'a-Dah, Adah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter אֵילוֹן֙ <S%H356><s%> 'ei-lOn of Elon הַֽחִתִּ֔י <S%H2850><s%> ha-chit-Ti, the Hittite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אָהֳלִֽיבָמָה֙ <S%H173><s%> 'o-ho-li-va-Mah and Aholibamah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter עֲנָ֔ה <S%H6034><s%> 'a-Nah, of Anah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter צִבְע֖וֹן <S%H6649><s%> tziv-'on of Zibeon הַֽחִוִּֽי׃ <S%H2340><s%> Ha-chiv-Vi. the Hivite

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בָּשְׂמַ֥ת <S%H1315><s%> ba-se-Mat And Bashemath בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- daughter יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <S%H3458><s%> yish-ma-'El Ishmael's אֲח֥וֹת <S%H269><s%> a-Chot sister נְבָיֽוֹת׃ <S%H5032><s%> ne-va-Yot. of Nebajoth

וַתֵּ֧לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led bare עָדָ֛ה <S%H5711><s%> 'a-Dah And Adah לְעֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> le-'e-Sav to Esau אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱלִיפָ֑ז <S%H464><s%> 'e-li-Faz; Eliphaz וּבָ֣שְׂמַ֔ת <S%H1315><s%> u-Va-se-Mat, and Bashemath יָלְדָ֖ה <S%H3205><s%> Yal-dah bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רְעוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H7467><s%> re-'u-'El. Reuel

וְאָהֳלִֽיבָמָה֙ <S%H173><s%> ve-'o-ho-li-va-Mah And Aholibamah יָֽלְדָ֔ה <S%H3205><s%> Yal-dah, bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ; יעישׁ ·'-yosh כיְע֥וּשׁ <S%H3266><s%> ye-'Ush Jehush קוְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יַעְלָ֖ם <S%H3281><s%> ya'-Lam and Jaalam וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et קֹ֑רַח <S%H7141><s%> Ko-rach; and Korah אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei these [are] the sons עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav, of Esau אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יֻלְּדוּ־ <S%H3205><s%> yul-le-du- which were born ל֖וֹ lo בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz unto him in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took עֵשָׂ֡ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav And Esau אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נָ֠שָׁיו <S%H802><s%> Na-shav his wives וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בָּנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav and his sons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בְּנֹתָיו֮ <S%H1323><s%> be-no-Tav and his daughters וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all נַפְשׁ֣וֹת <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shot and all the persons בֵּיתוֹ֒ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To of his house וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִקְנֵ֣הוּ <S%H4735><s%> mik-Ne-hu and his cattle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all בְּהֶמְתּ֗וֹ <S%H929><s%> be-hem-To, and all his beasts וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all קִנְיָנ֔וֹ <S%H7075><s%> kin-ya-No, and all his substance אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which רָכַ֖שׁ <S%H7408><s%> ra-Chash which he had got בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech and went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz, into the country מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from the face יַעֲקֹ֥ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob אָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv. of his brother

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah had become רְכוּשָׁ֛ם <S%H7399><s%> re-chu-Sham For their riches רָ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> rav were more מִשֶּׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> mish-She-vet than that they might dwell יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav; together וְלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יָֽכְלָ֜ה <S%H3201><s%> ya-che-Lah could אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz and the land מְגֽוּרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4033><s%> me-gu-rei-Hem wherein they were strangers לָשֵׂ֣את <S%H5375><s%> la-Set not bear אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam, מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei them because מִקְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4735><s%> mik-nei-Hem. of their cattle

וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev Thus dwelt עֵשָׂו֙ <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav Esau בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har in mount שֵׂעִ֔יר <S%H8165><s%> se-'Ir, Seir עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav Esau ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> e-Dom. [is] Edom

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh These תֹּלְד֥וֹת <S%H8435><s%> to-le-Dot And these [are] the generations עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav of Esau אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi the father אֱד֑וֹם <S%H123><s%> e-Dom; of the Edomites בְּהַ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har in mount שֵׂעִֽיר׃ <S%H8165><s%> se-'Ir. Seir

אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot These [are] the names בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- sons עֵשָׂ֑ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav; of Esau's אֱלִיפַ֗ז <S%H464><s%> 'e-li-Faz, Eliphaz בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עָדָה֙ <S%H5711><s%> 'a-Dah of Adah אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet the wife עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav, of Esau רְעוּאֵ֕ל <S%H7467><s%> re-'u-'El Reuel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son בָּשְׂמַ֖ת <S%H1315><s%> ba-se-Mat of Bashemath אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet the wife עֵשָֽׂו׃ <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav. of Esau

וַיִּהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu become בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the sons אֱלִיפָ֑ז <S%H464><s%> 'e-li-Faz; of Eliphaz תֵּימָ֣ן <S%H8487><s%> tei-Man were Teman אוֹמָ֔ר <S%H201><s%> o-Mar, Omar צְפ֥וֹ <S%H6825><s%> tze-Fo Zepho וְגַעְתָּ֖ם <S%H1609><s%> ve-ga'-Tam and Gatam וּקְנַֽז׃ <S%H7073><s%> u-ke-Naz. and Kenaz

וְתִמְנַ֣ע׀ <S%H8555><s%> ve-tim-Na' And Timna הָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah become פִילֶ֗גֶשׁ <S%H6370><s%> fi-Le-gesh, was concubine לֶֽאֱלִיפַז֙ <S%H464><s%> le-'e-li-Faz to Eliphaz בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav, Esau's וַתֵּ֥לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led and she bare לֶאֱלִיפַ֖ז <S%H464><s%> le-'e-li-Faz to Eliphaz אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> 'a-ma-Lek; Amalek אֵ֕לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei these [were] the sons עָדָ֖ה <S%H5711><s%> 'a-Dah of Adah אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet wife עֵשָֽׂו׃ <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav. Esau's
